column1: Baby Barnaby's////Incredibly rude staff. Upon arriving
column2: there was no host in sight so my pregnant wife attempted to go into the restaurant to check-in. But a male waiter outside shouted to stop her and asked DID YOU SIGN THE CLIPBOARD
column3: as if he was expecting us
column5: to know where it was. He didn't even instruct us to the location of the clipboard. We were initially excited to take our pup here
column6: but was shocked by the rudeness. Needless to say
column7: we left right away. Glad to be taking our patronage to somewhere else. To the ownership/management - please train your staff on hospitality.
